name: Babe
wishText: Dear my love (BÃ© Äá»— Mai HÃ  Anh)! ğŸŒ¹ğŸ’– On this special day, I just want you to know how incredibly blessed I am to have you in my life. Your love brings warmth to my heart, joy to my soul, and endless smiles to my face. Thank you for being my everything and filling every moment with love. Here's to creating more beautiful memories together. I love you more than words can express. Happy Valentine's Day, my dearest
